name: bluk-berry
effect: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
short_effect: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Beauty. Its blue flesh is sour when eaten.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Beauty. Its blue flesh is sour when eaten.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Used to make Pokéblocks that will enhance your Beauty. Its blue flesh is sour when eaten.
